Articles.Content:
Hello! ;D

First post on the forums here, though I\'ve been trawling them for any scrap of .16 info I can get... :-[

That\'s beside the point, however!

Introducing my first (relatively) functional jet aircraft - the Kendred A-5 Angel. Named for it\'s first pilot Kendred Kerman - who braved five generations of prototypes and failures of the Angel series before piloting the first successful flight in the A-5 Angel. After also contributing several designs and improvements on the A-5, Kendred was killed in an unfortunate and misguided attempt at launching the prototype A-6 into orbit.

Gone, but not forgotten. :\'(

It is a highly manoeuvrable, low altitude stunt plane/fighter. Some notes on the craft:


  • [li]Highly manoeuvrable - capable of upwards of 20g turns.[/li]
    [li]Very short take off and landing - would be a suitable aircraft carrier fighter if weaponised.[/li]
    [li]Extremely well balanced.[/li]
    [li]Leather interior and icy A/C for those baking Kerbin summers.[/li]

The Kendred A-5 Angel

Kendred Kermans young protÃ©gÃ©, Tomlie Kerman, demonstrating his skill and confidence in the hotseat.

Any feedback would be welcome!

*Requires C7 Aerospace Pack and NovaPunch Remix

EDIT: If you decide to take it for a ride, be sure to hit caps-lock and turn on fine control - this baby can roll. Fast.
You also need to list NovaPunch as one of the required mods, as you have those winglet anchors.
Ah! Sorry about that, thanks for pointing it out.
